#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t = 5,Nstud,Rno,off,count,temp,i;
    while(t--)
    {
              int a[121];
              scanf("%d%*c%d",&Nstud,&Rno);
              //cout << Nstud << " " << Rno << endl;
              for(i=1;i<=Nstud;i++)
                 a[i] = i;
              Rno;
              temp = 0;
              count = 0;
              int z = Nstud;
              while(z != 1)
              {
                   while(count != Rno)
                   {
                       temp++;
                      // cout <<"temp " <<  temp << endl;
                       if(temp > Nstud){
                       //cout << "greater" << endl;
                       temp = temp % Nstud;}
                       //cout <<"temp " <<  temp << endl;
                       if(a[temp] != -1)
                       {
                           //cout << "counted" << endl;
                           count++;
                       }
                       //getch();
                   }
                   count = 0;
                   off = a[temp];
                   //cout << "off is " << off << endl;
                   a[temp] = -1;
                   z--;
              }
              cout << off << endl;
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
